message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product will be highly valuable to you, and this offer is a great opportunity to acquire it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $13,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for a little closer to my original price. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose $13,000 as the final offer for the product.
